title: Leave buster putting me in Low priority queue because of firewall errors and computer crash
body:
In the past week or two i have been living with my relatives. I brought my laptop and have been experiencing firewall issues. After finally getting in game i would be quite behind and at the end of the match i ended up in Low priority queue. Its been happening so much i ended up with a 10 minute timer. In my last game my computer crashed and know i have a 20 minute timer. My personal opinion on this is that it is ridiculous. And know i ask if i could get this low priority queue taken off me

Thanks

replies.body: I happened once to me in 4 weeks and was put in a que for 20 minute sits total bs

Leavebuster only punishes people who repeatedly offend. If you're having issues connecting, then don't go into public queues, and sort out your issues in a custom game.

Additionally, if your game "crashes" and you immediately reconnect, it's NOT counted as a leave.
